import "./loginStyles.css"; import {Redirect} from "react-router-dom"; import { useContext } from "react"; import isLoggedInUser from "../store/store" const Login = (props) => { const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useContext(isLoggedInUser); const { email, setEmail, password, setPassword, handleLogin, handleSignUp, hasAccount, setHasAccount, emailError, passwordError } = props; return ( <>

setEmail(e.target.value)} >

{emailError}


setPassword(e.target.value)} >

{passwordError}

{hasAccount ? ( <>

Don't have an account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)} > Sign up

) : ( <>

Have an account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)} > Sign in

)}
{isLoggedIn ? : (<>)}
); }; export default Login;
